creator: OmTec Web
descriptionHtml:
PixyTrim ❤❣❣
Let your imagination run wild and express your creativity with PixyTrim, and a simple and free photo editor app. No need to sign up for an account; download and start editing. Create professional-quality collages, get image filters and drawing tools. PixyTrim is an all-in-one photo editor, and the collage maker is provided with everything needed to add your style and stand out.

PixyTrim Features⚡:

PHOTO EDITING
👉 Try the latest photo filters to your image and other popular photo effects of this amazing photo editing app!
👉 Make use of millions of free images, and edit your images
👉 Text can be added to your photos using professional fonts.
👉 Blur images and enhance photos with super-high resolution zoom to make pixel perfect edits
👉 It allows you to share your pictures directly on WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.

PHOTO COLLAGE MAKER
👉 PixyTrim is a free collage maker app which you can make modern photo collages of your most adored photo album!!!
👉 PixyTrim allows you to select from various outstanding photo grid layouts to display your best photo grid
👉 You can even resize your best photo collages.
👉 This perfect photo editor app also offers you fantastic photo effects for making a pic collage.
👉 It permits you to merge up to 7 photos at a time to make your best pic collage.

PHOTO EFFECTS & FILTERS
👉 New style editor that includes various options for filters and other photo effects.
👉 There are blur options with 10 amazing photo filter effects

PHOTO LIGHT EDITING TOOL
👉 PixyTrim allows you to edit various lighting effects to your cool photos as per your requirements!
👉 Photo Light effect editing can be done by using:
Photo Saturation Editing:-
⚡️ You can easily select/adjust the saturation level while applying it to your cool Fotos.
⚡️ You can set your photo saturation level from (0% to 100%) 😍.

Photo Brightness Adjustment:-
⚡️ Using PixyTrim you can even adjust the photo brightness level very easily and fast 🤩.
⚡️ From brightness settings you can easily increase the brightness or decrease the brightness level of your cool pictures from (-100 to +100)

Photo Contrast Editing:-
⚡️ Using the PixyTrim app you can easily edit your contrast photography by easily adjusting the photo contrast level 😎.
⚡️ From the contrast setting you can select your image contrast level from (25% to 75%)

PHOTO CUTTING TOOL
👉 PixyTrim is also a very easy and advanced image cutter tool.
👉 One can select crop ratio for images from:
⇨ Free crop image
⇨ Original ratio cropping
⇨ 2:3
⇨ 3:2
⇨ 4:3
⇨ 16:9
👉 You can also rotate your cool photos to 360° as much as you want.
👉 Using PixyTrim you can even select the scale range of your images from 12.5% to 100%

IMAGE RATIO TOOL
👉 Using the PixyTrim app one can even select the various image aspect ratio as per their requirements.
👉 There are 20 various image ratios are available in this amazing photo editor app! 🙂
👉 This perfect photo editor app also allows you in changing aspect ratio of image according to the various social media posts!
👉 Various ratios for various social media posts available in this all in one photo editing app are:-
✦ Facebook (FB Mobile Cover Ratio, FB Post Ratio)
✦ Instagram (Ig Story Ratio, Ig post “1:1, 4:5 Ratio”)
✦ Movie Screen Ratio
✦ Twitter (Twitter Header Ratio, Twitter Post Ratio)
✦ Youtube Cover Post Ratio

DRAWING TOOL
👉 Utilize PixyTrim Draw with brushes that you can customize layers, brushes, with drawing tools
👉 You can even edit text and font sizes.
👉 You can also add shape and even color in shape.

IMAGE COMPRESSOR AND RESIZER TOOL

👉 PixyTrim - Photo Editor app is not only a photo editing app but also is the best image resizer and image compressor app.
👉 You can easily compress and resize images in just a single click!!!

So, What are you waiting for? Download this amazing All In One Image editor, Image resizer, Image compressor, and even Image grid maker app now!!
descriptionShort: PixyTrim - Photo Editing, Collage Maker, & Image Resizer and Compressor App

descriptionHtml:
PixyTrim All In One Perfect Photo Editor App
Let your imagination run wild and express your creativity with PixyTrim Perfect and free ultra hd photo editor app download and start editing. Create perfect and professional-quality collages, and get image filters and drawing tools. PixyTrim is an all in one perfect photo editor, and the collage maker is provided with everything needed to add your style and stand blurout.

PixyTrim Features:

PERFECT PHOTO EDITING
• Try the` to your image and other popular photo effects of this perfectly clear photo editing app!
• Make use of millions of free images, and edit your images
• Text can be added to your photos using professional fonts
• Blur images and enhance photos with super-high resolution zoom to make pixel perfect photography & share your pictures directly on WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc

PERFECT PHOTO COLLAGE MAKER
• PixyTrim is a free collage maker app which you can make modern photo collages on android of your most adored photo album
• PixyTrim allows you to select from various outstanding photo grid layouts to display your best photo grid perfectly
• You can even resize your best photo collage on android
• This pixel perfect photography app also offers you fantastic photo effects for making a pic collage & merge up to 7 photos at a time to make your best pic collage

PERFECT PHOTO EFFECTS & FILTERS
• New style best blur photo editor app that includes blur options with 10 amazing photo filter effects and other photo effects.

PERFECT PHOTO LIGHT EDITING TOOL
• PixyTrim allows you to edit various lighting effects to your cool photos as per your requirements
• Photo Light effect editing can be done by using:
Photo Saturation Editing:-contra
• You can easily select/adjust the photo saturation level while applying it to your cool Fotos.

Photo Brightness Adjustment:-
• By this photo brightness editor app, you can even adjust the photo brightness level very easily and fast
• From brightness settings, you can quickly increase the brightness or decrease the brightness level of your cool pictures from (-100 to +100)

Photo Contrast Editing:-
• Using the image contrast editor, you can easily edit your contrast photography by quickly adjusting the photo contrast level by selecting your contrast level between (25% & 75%).

PERFECT PHOTO CUTTING TOOL
➡ PixyTrim is also a straightforward and perfect image cutter tool
➡ One can select crop ratio for images from:
Free crop image,
Original ratio cropping,
2:3,
3:2,
4:3,
16:9
➡ You can also rotate your cool photos to 360° as much as you want

PERFECT IMAGE RATIO TOOL
• Using the PixyTrim app one can even select the various image aspect ratio as per their requirements
• There are 20 various image ratios available in this fantastic ultra hd photo editor apk! 🙂
• This picture perfect photo editor app also allows changing aspect ratio of image according to the various social media posts!
• Various ratios for various social media posts available in this all in one photo editor app are:-
✦ Facebook (FB Mobile Cover Ratio, FB Post Ratio)
✦ Instagram (Ig Story Ratio, Ig post “1:1, 4:5 Ratio”)
✦ Movie Screen Ratio
✦ Twitter (Twitter Header Ratio, Twitter Post Ratio)
✦ Youtube Cover Post Ratio

PERFECT DRAWING TOOL
• Utilize PixyTrim Draw with brushes that you can customize layers & brushes with drawing tools
• You can even edit text and font sizes and add shape and color to the shape

PERFECT IMAGE COMPRESSOR AND RESIZER TOOL
• PixyTrim - Perfect Photo Editor app is a perfectly clear photo editing app & the best image resizer and image compressor app that easily compresses and resizes images in a single click!

PERFECT PHOTO BLENDER
• Looking for an app that blends two photos together than this multiple photo blender app.
• And this blend photo editor app can blend two photos with 29 blending options.
